item.title: SANS FOR608
item.description: Enterprise Threat hunting and Response Introduction Brief overview of forensic analysis and its application Course Overview Proactive Detection and Response (608.1) Scaling Response and Analysis (608.2) Modern Attacks against Windows and Linux DFIR (608.3) Analyzing macOS and Docker Containers (608.4) Cloud Attacks and Response (608.5) Capstone: Enterprise-Class IR Challenge Key Takeaways Summary of key concepts and skills learned during the course Analysis of learning outcomes and their application in real-world scenarios Conclusion and Recommendations Summary of overall effectiveness of the SANS Forensics course for608 Recommendations for future students looking to learn forensic analysis skills Gain Practical Experience Develop Your Analytical Skills Learn about Cloud Computing Familiarize Yourself with Linux and macOS Join Online Communities Consider Specializing in a Specific Area Stay Up-to-Date with Industry Developments Enterprise Threat hunting and Response (FOR608) Course description from SANSÂ 1 :
